dataset_name: FinTech Risk Nexus Dataset - Sub-Saharan Africa
description: Comprehensive dataset capturing interconnected FinTech risks in Sub-Saharan African economies
data_sources_note: This is synthetic data generated for research purposes

variable_descriptions.cyber_incidents_reported: Number of cybersecurity incidents reported in the financial sector per quarter
variable_descriptions.google_trend_mobile_fraud: Google search trend index (0-100) for "mobile money fraud" and related terms
variable_descriptions.data_breach_severity_index: Severity index of data breaches (1-10 scale)
variable_descriptions.phishing_attempts_per_1000_users: Frequency of phishing attempts per 1000 FinTech users
variable_descriptions.social_media_sentiment_score: Aggregate sentiment from social media analysis (-100 to +100)
variable_descriptions.net_promoter_score: NPS for major FinTech brands (-100 to +100)
variable_descriptions.herfindahl_hirschman_index: Market concentration measure (0-10000, higher = more concentrated)
variable_descriptions.new_fintech_licenses_issued: Number of new FinTech licenses issued per quarter
variable_descriptions.market_entry_rate: New entrants as percentage of existing players
variable_descriptions.composite_cyber_risk: Weighted composite of cyber risk factors
variable_descriptions.risk_adjusted_growth_potential: Growth potential adjusted for risk factors
